name: Time Will Tell (André Santos, Miguel Feliciano, Afonso Lage)
name_original: Time Will Tell (André Santos, Miguel Feliciano, Afonso Lage)
description:
Time Will Tell is a 3D, first-person, adventure game, where the player goes back and forth between the present and the past to find clues and solve puzzles that lead him to VHS tapes left by his missing parents, explaining their sudden disappearance.

Controls:
  • W, A, S, D - Walk
  • Tab, I - Directory/Inventory
  • Mouse (Left) - Interact
  • Mouse (Right) - Show/Hide Inspect Mode
  • Space Bar - Memory Travel
  • Escape, P - Pause
Developed by:
  • Afonso Lage - itch.io
  • André Santos - itch.io
  • Miguel Feliciano - itch.io
